Disabling Security

To disable security:

  1. Select the project database or project associated with the access control database that you want to disable. The access control database will no longer control security for the project database or project.

  2. Select Admin | Configure Project. The Configure Project dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  3. If not already selected, select the Show Advanced Options check box.

  4. In the Options list, select Access Control Database beneath Security. The Access Control Database pane on the right appears.

  5. Deselect the Enable access control database security check box.

  6. Click OK.
